alert.note: Alert for Upper Santa Cruz River and Altar Valleys including Nogales (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:26PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Cruz County through 200 PM MST... At 125 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rio Rico, or 9 miles northwest of Nogales, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rio Rico. This includes Interstate 19 between mile markers 8 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
